item.title: moonside inn
item.description:
weekly update

home

made some updates to my home page, including a little camera roll of recent photos i've taken

recipes

recipe book

i made cinnamon rolls for the first time in years, I adapted the recipe from Professional Baking by Wayne Glissen. if you try it let me know how they came out in my guestbook!

music

music

new album of the week!

books

books

made some progress on A Journey to a Small Angry Planet, this week i'm offically locked in ahah. dnf'd DIE though, not sure what it was but I wasn't really captured by the story so I'll be returning it to the library

item.title: moonside player
item.description: an update to my music page featuring album of the week, my top albums, and a few playlists/mixes i've made!
